title: Kiddy Girl-and
resume: Kiddy GiRL-AND is a 2009 sequel to the science fiction anime series Kiddy Grade, created by gímik and Satelight and directed by Keiji Gotoh. The manga adaptation Kiddy Girl-and Pure, illustrated by Yukari Higa, ran in Comp Ace and was released as two collected volumes.

The manga adaptation Kiddy Girl-and Pure, illustrated by Yukari Higa, ran in Comp Ace and was released as two collected volumes.
